What is InagataHub?

About InagataHub

Kami mencari pahlawan super seperti kalian! Dapatkan pengalaman bekerja diperusahaan teknologi bersama-sama membentuk masa depan yang lebih baik

Programs InagataHub

Our Programs

Beginners

Internship School

Pengembangan kompetensi diri dibidang teknologi dan informasi dengan bimbingan mentor yang berpengalaman minimal 3 bulan untuk universitas dan 4 bulan untuk SMK

Intermediate

Continuing Profesional Development(CPD)

Menjadi bagian Tim menangani suatu project secara profesional dibidang teknologi dan informasi selama 1 tahun

Process at InagataHub

Recruitment Process

Recruitment Process

Focus on consumer, growth mindset, and the idea of make-it-happen-and-make-it-better serve as the three directions that our rhetorical compass points towards. We set our sights and keep our eyes on the prize.

Our Available Roles

We are in the process of expanding our offices to multiple locations across Indonesia. Want to join our development team, but found it hard to relocate? We also provide remote working possibilities for engineering positions, feel free to apply and mention this in your application.
